document.full_text: simon fuller, the british creator of hit tv show "american idol," received a star on the hollywood walk of fame on monday surrounded by some of the real-life stars he has helped to create.
document.title: "idol" creator simon fuller gets hollywood star
lines_and_colors: simon fuller, the british creator of hit tv show "american idol," received a star on the hollywood walk of fame on monday surrounded by some of the real-life stars he has helped to create.
